Sentencas: When using conventional fossil fuels, most fuel cell systems require sulfur removal as part of their fuel processing.
Titulo: Analysis of a heat recirculating cooler for fuel gas sulfur removal in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A novel approach to enable conventional sulfur removal in high-temperature fuel processing is presented.
Titulo: Analysis of a heat recirculating cooler for fuel gas sulfur removal in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Using established principles from heat-recirculating combustors, it is suggested that high-temperature syngas can be momentarily cooled to conditions that would permit conventional sulfur removal to be carried out at relatively low temperatures.
Titulo: Analysis of a heat recirculating cooler for fuel gas sulfur removal in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The recirculated heat is then used to heat the gas back to conditions that are minimally less than the original temperature.
Titulo: Analysis of a heat recirculating cooler for fuel gas sulfur removal in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A model for evaluating the performance of this concept is presented, and calculations suggest that relative to fuel cell applications, reasonable physical dimensions can be expected in actual applications.
Titulo: Analysis of a heat recirculating cooler for fuel gas sulfur removal in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For high-pressure syngas (i.e., coal gasification), the physical dimensions will rise with the operating pressure.
Titulo: Analysis of a heat recirculating cooler for fuel gas sulfur removal in solid oxide fuel cells
